text: 12.18: Ais 42.1-4 naŋga, Mt 3.17 naŋga, 17.5Nɨŋandɨhin yandɨ sɨmbɨrakara mɨŋga. Yi nuŋ yambi yɨhɨramamin. Yi nuŋ mavɨndamamaŋgarandin, naŋga yandɨ mavɨnɨmbu nuŋambirɨm kɨnzɨhɨnzɨtɨmaŋgari. Yandɨ Mavɨñɨŋi nu naŋga tamɨman. Kamatɨn tɨtɨ vanarɨmɨndaya krunavundi pɨrɨvɨsa muvundumuvundu haŋɨnɨŋ ambavarɨmandɨ.
